    • createShortestPathTo

      public int createShortestPathTo(int start_date, Case end, Carte carte, Simulateur sim, SimpleChefPompier chef)
      Finds shortest part from current position to Case end and adds Deplacements to the simulator at the corresponding dates. If Robot is already at the target it asks for a new task
